name: Boucher
biography: Horace Edward Boucher (1874-1935, American, b. Italy) was a naval architect. Established naval model-making business (name?) in 1905, located at 95 Maiden Lane, New York, NY. Made ship models for U.S. Navy. Early in 20th c. he incorporated, moved business to 415 Madison Avenue. Operated wholesale and retail business in ship models, kits, toys in addition to buidling architectural and other models on commission.
